properties.name: Traffic Log
properties.tagline: Track and monitor all HTTP requests to the site.

sections.title: Traffic Log Options
summary: Purpose - Provides finer control over the live traffic system.
Recommendation - These settings are dependent on your requirements.

sections.title: Traffic Rate Limiting
summary: Purpose - Provides ability to restrict excessive requests from a single visitor.
Recommendation - These settings are dependent on your requirements.

sections.title: Enable Module: Traffic Log
summary: Purpose - The Traffic Log module lets you monitor and review all requests to your site.
Recommendation - Required only if you need to review and investigate and monitor requests to your site.

options.name: Enable Traffic Log
options.summary: Enable (or Disable) The Traffic Log Module
options.description: Un-Checking this option will completely disable the Traffic Log module.

options.name: Enable Traffic Logger
options.summary: Turn On The Traffic Logging Feature
options.description: Enable or disable the ability to log and monitor requests to your site.

options.name: Traffic Log Exclusions
options.summary: Select Which Types Of Requests To Exclude
options.description: Deselect any requests that you don't want to appear in the traffic viewer.

options.name: Custom Exclusions
options.description: For each entry, if the text is present in either the User Agent or Page/Path, it will be excluded.

options.name: Log Retention
options.description: Automated DB cleanup will delete logs older than this maximum value (in days).

options.name: Enable Rate Limiting
options.summary: Turn On The Rate Limiting Feature
options.description: Enable or disable the rate limiting feature according to your rate limiting parameters.

options.name: Max Request Limit
options.summary: Maximum Number Of Requests Allowed In Time Limit
options.description: The maximum number of requests that are allowed in the given time limit.

options.name: Request Limit Time Interval
options.summary: The Time Interval To Test For Excessive Requests
options.description: The time limit within which to monitor for excessive requests that exceed the limit.
